fields.name: genre
fields.title: Genre
fields.description: The name of the genre, a mostly comprehensive subset of the full Spotify genre list

fields.name: x
fields.title: X
fields.description: Low values of x denote heavier genres (e.g. metal) whilst higher values are for lighter genres (e.g. pop)

fields.name: y
fields.title: Y
fields.description: Low values of y denote more organic genres (e.g. classical) whilst higher values are for more mechanical genres (e.g. techno)

description: This dataset is downloaded from everynoise.com and expresses Spotify genres across 5 dimensions, primarily heavy/light and organic/mechanic. Glenn McDonald (Senior Software Engineer at Spotify) is the creator of EveryNoise, this dataset has been derived from his work.
title: Every Noise
name: every-noise
